title: Baked Bread Pudding
ingredients: ['1 loaf day old bread', '375g caster sugar', '2 tablespoons custard powder', '2 tablespoons cornflour', '4 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '2 eggs, beaten', '500g mixed dried fruit', '250g almonds, divided', '250g glace cherries, halved, divided', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '4 tablespoons whisky']
